text:

attachments.title: add regex support in treesitter queries by bfredl · Pull Request #11880 · neovim/neovim
attachments.text: Support (match? @capture &quot;^regex$&quot;) predicates in tree-sitter queries, as stated in <https://tree-sitter.github.io/tree-sitter/using-parsers#pattern-matching-with-queries>. Default to &quot...
